DOC.brief_summary: Postoperative pain may affect general anaesthetic . The effect propofol sevoflurane postoperative pain chinese female patient demonstrate . This study compare postoperative pain score patient general anaesthesia maintain propofol , sevoflurane , sevoflurane+propofol .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Sevoflurane , Propofol , Sevoflurane Plus Propofol Maintenance Anaesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: After approval Institute 's Ethics Committee , study conduct Tongji Hospital , general university teach hospital 2500 bed Wuhan , China.The study consist female patient , American Society Anaesthesiologists Physical Status ( ASA-PS ) I II , suffer infertility , undergo selective gynaecological laparoscopic hysteroscopic surgery . All patient randomly assign receive propofol , sevoflurane , sevoflurane+propofol anaesthesia maintenance . The primary outcome measure level postoperative pain assess Numerical Analogue Scale ( NAS ) rest 0.5 hour operation . The secondary outcome postoperative pain assess Numerical Analogue Scale ( NAS ) rest 1 24 hour operation , incidence postoperative nausea vomiting , incidence shiver , quality recovery determine QOR40 first 24 h surgery .
DOC.criteria: ASA physical status class 1 2 Aged > =18 year = < 40 year old Suffering infertility Under elective gynaecological laparoscopic hysteroscopic surgery ASAPS > =III Aged 18 yr 40 yr old Body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 Respiratory Neurologic disease Chronic antidepressant Anticonvulsant drug Chronic analgesic intake A know allergy drug use History substance abuse Participating investigation another experimental agent Participating investigation another study
